Title: The Punishment Lighter
Plot: Nancy gets busted and Heylia teaches her about a $14,000 lesson. Doug and Celia make kitchen talk. The kids have daddy problems during diversity week. Bread-sticks and Scones, Nancy's bakery, opens and doesn't start off so well. And Celia retakes the PTA by way of a technicality.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes
GuestStars: Stephon Fuller, Matt Nolan, Maulik Pancholy
